name: Philosophy
description: Department of Philosophy , established in 1956. It is  unique in its innovative and extensive curricula and research programmes. Its strong foundations were laid by stalwarts like Prof. Gopinath Bhattacharya, Prof. Kali Krishna Banerjee, Prof. Pranab Kumar Sen, Prof. Debi Prasad Chattopadhyay, Prof. Pradyot Kumar Mukhopadhyay, Prof. Sailaja Kumar Bhattacharya, Prof. Sukharanjan Saha, Prof. Hiranmoy Bandyopadhyay, Prof. Madhabendra Nath Mitra, Prof. Krishna Roy, Prof. Sutapa Saha, Prof. Srilekha Datta and others
